.. _wx.lib.pydocview.FilePropertiesDialog:

==========================================================================================================================================
|phoenix_title|  **wx.lib.pydocview.FilePropertiesDialog**
==========================================================================================================================================

Dialog that shows the properties of a file.  Invoked by the PropertiesService.



|
